import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "../header/header"; import Footer from "../footer/Footer"; import './Product.css'; const Product = () => { const { productId } = useParams(); const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); // State to hold cart items // const[isCartVisible, setCartVisble] = useState(false); const [isCartVisible, setCartVisible] = useState(false); // State to toggle cart visibility useEffect(() => { // Simulate fetching product details const fetchProduct = async () => { const mockProducts = { 1: { id: 1, name: "Big Mac", description: "Tasty burger", price: 120 }, 2: { id: 2, name: "Chicken McNuggets", description: "Crispy nuggets", price: 100 }, 3: { id: 3, name: "French Fries", description: "Crunchy fries", price: 50 }, }; setTimeout(() => { setProduct(mockProducts[productId]); setLoading(false); }, 500); // Simulate API delay }; // to add the item in cart with removble button and also also calculated the total of all the item and forword to the checkout ap fetchProduct(); }, [productId]); // Add item to cart const addToCart = (item) => { setCart([...cart, item]); setCartVisible(true); // Show the cart when an item is added }; // Remove item from cart const removeFromCart = (indexToRemove) => { setCart(cart.filter((_, index) => index !== indexToRemove)); }; // Calculate total price const getTotal = () => { return cart.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price, 0); }; if (loading) return

Loading...
